name: Flight Deck Cockpit Landing: LET-410 at Isle of Man
description:
Flight deck approach and landing into Isle of Man runway 08 onboard Citywing LET-410 OK-TCA, after operating a flight from Belfast City Airport, Northern Ireland.

Video is taken from seat 1A, please subscribe/comment!

GoPro Hero 3

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
